metadata.name: Download From Suspicious TLD - Whitelist
metadata.comment: Detects executable downloads from suspicious remote systems

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM http_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 3 AND (lower(LOWER(http_request.url)) in ('exe', 'vbs', 'bat', 'rar', 'ps1', 'doc', 'docm', 'xls', 'xlsm', 'pptm', 'rtf', 'hta', 'dll', 'ws', 'wsf', 'sct', 'zip')) AND NOT (endswith(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('.com')) OR endswith(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('.org')) OR endswith(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('.net')) OR endswith(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('.edu')) OR endswith(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('.gov')) OR endswith(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('.uk')) OR endswith(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('.ca')) OR endswith(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('.de')) OR endswith(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('.jp')) OR endswith(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('.fr')) OR endswith(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('.au')) OR endswith(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('.us')) OR endswith(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('.ch')) OR endswith(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('.it')) OR endswith(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('.nl')) OR endswith(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('.se')) OR endswith(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('.no')) OR endswith(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('.es'))))

output.summary: Detects executable downloads from suspicious remote systems

metadata.objective: Examine fields: ClientIP, http_request.url False positive: All kind of software downloads Reference: Internal Research
